translation.en: [girl] Okay, class, today's song is "The Clapping Song" by Shirley Ellis.
translation.it: Ok, classe, la canzone di oggi è "The Clapping Song" di Shirley Ellis.

translation.en: When you sing, I want to hear every word clearly and succinctly.
translation.it: Quando cantate, voglio sentire ogni parola in modo chiaro e scandito.

translation.en: [Yumi] Can you sing it first, Amber?
After we see how you do it, we sing much better.
translation.it: Dopo aver visto come fai tu, cantiamo molto meglio.

translation.en: [Amber] Okay, okay. Um, but just the first verse.
translation.it: Ok. Ma solo il primo verso.

translation.en: [Amber] Thank you, thank you. Okay. Is everyone ready?
translation.it: - Grazie. Ok. Siete tutte pronte? - Sì!

translation.en: [clears throat] Now, what do we have to remember, my Divas?
The biggest claps you could give me.
translation.it: Battete le mani più forte che potete.

translation.en: Father Chee. I need soul claps. Come on.
translation.it: Padre Chee. Mi servono battiti soul. Avanti.

translation.en: All right, are you ready for this verse?
I need to hear every single word as clear as you can!
translation.it: Devo sentire ogni parola più chiaramente possibile!

translation.en: And then I need soul claps too.

translation.it: PAGA QUELLO CHE PUOI LEZIONI D'INGLESE

translation.en: Thank you. Have a good night.

translation.it: DAL LIBRO SORTA LIKE A ROCK STAR DI MATTHEW QUICK

translation.en: Are you still hungry, Bobby Big Boy?
-[Mom] Hi, baby. -You're late. Where have you been?
translation.it: - Mamma. - Ciao, tesoro. - Sei in ritardo. Dov'eri? - Lo so. Ma ti ho portato una cosa.

translation.en: I know, I know. But I brought you something.
translation.it: - Sei in ritardo. Dov'eri? - Lo so. Ma ti ho portato una cosa.

translation.en: Who says dessert can't be dinner?
translation.it: Chi dice che non può essere cena?

translation.en: You telling me nutritionists don’t like cheesecake?
translation.it: Ai nutrizionisti non piace la cheesecake?

translation.en: This is from the Copper Kettle.
Did you sit at the bar?
I had one glass of wine.
translation.it: Ho bevuto un bicchiere di vino.

translation.en: -Just one. -You're not supposed to have any.
But it was-- It was just one.
So Oliver’s back in the picture now?
No! No, not really. This just-- This is a way to get us some dinner.
translation.it: No! Non proprio. È solo... Solo per avere un pasto.

translation.en: You were supposed to look at apartments, not get cheesecake from Oliver.
translation.it: Dovresti cercare case, non prendere cheesecake da Oliver.

translation.en: Well, that's all that he could give me, so I took it,
translation.it: Beh, poteva darmi quella e l'ho presa,

translation.en: and I'm sorry that it's not good enough for you.
translation.it: mi spiace che non sia abbastanza.

translation.en: Oh, it's really good, Mom, actually.
translation.it: Oh, è davvero buona, mamma, davvero.

translation.en: -No. I don't want any. -Have some. Don't be mad.
-Just a little bite. I promise. -I'm not mad.
translation.it: - Non voglio. - Su. - Solo un boccone. Giuro. - No.

translation.en: It's the best cheesecake I've ever had and you're saying no.
translation.it: È la miglior cheesecake che abbia mangiato e dici di no.

translation.en: And sings the tune without the words,
And sweetest in the gale is heard;
translation.it: e si ode dolce nella tempesta.

translation.en: And sore must be the storm
That could abash the little bird
I've heard it in the chillest land,
translation.it: L'ho udito nel paese più freddo

translation.en: It asked a crumb of me."
Some storm we're in, huh, baby?
translation.it: Ci troviamo in una brutta tempesta.

translation.en: -[mock scoff] Way to aim low, Mom. -[chuckles]
Would you like a donut today?
Hey, Mr. Linder. It's me, Amber.
No, I work here on the weekends,
but I had some donuts, so I thought I'd stop by.
translation.it: ma avevo dei donut, e sono passata.

translation.en: Careful, it's a category three in there today.
translation.it: Attenta, oggi è una categoria tre.

translation.en: Has anyone ever told you that you are loud?
translation.it: Ti hanno mai detto che sei rumorosa?

translation.en: -"Good" is a matter of opinion. -Well, here's a fact:
translation.it: - Che sia "buono" è un'opinione. - Ecco un fatto:

translation.en: Rainbow sprinkled donut? The best donut, and I saved it for you.
translation.it: donut arcobaleno? Il migliore, e l'ho tenuto per te.

translation.en: Some, uh, soothing entertainment to start your morning?
translation.it: Uno spettacolo rilassante per iniziare la giornata?

translation.en: Right. Uh, could I use your shower? Our water heater's still on the fritz.
translation.it: Bene. Posso usare la doccia? Il nostro scaldabagno fa ancora le bizze.

translation.en: You know, when I was your age, we didn't have hot showers.
translation.it: Quando avevo la tua età, non avevamo docce calde.

translation.en: Ooh. You wanna hear a joke?
You're gonna laugh this time. Ready?
What do you call a fish with no eyes?
translation.it: Cosa punta un pescatore al casinò?

translation.en: Careful, Joan. One of these days, I will make you laugh.
translation.it: Attenta, Joan. Uno di questi giorni ti farò ridere.

translation.en: Not if I make you cry first.
translation.it: Non se prima ti faccio piangere.

translation.en: You couldn't make me cry if you tried.
Ricky! Come on, dude, we have school!

translation.it: La mia sveglia BB-8 segnava le 7:12.

translation.en: You're waking me up a minute earlier every day.
translation.it: Ogni giorno mi svegli un minuto prima.

translation.en: You're on to me. The master plan is to eventually wake you up at 4:00 a.m.
translation.it: Mi hai scoperta. Il piano è arrivare a svegliarti alle 4.

translation.en: Before I even go to sleep!
translation.it: Ancor prima di andare a dormire?

translation.en: Which would totally suck, but might be sort of cool,
translation.it: Sarebbe uno schifo, ma forse anche fico,

translation.en: because then we could eat breakfast together and stay up all night.
translation.it: fare colazione insieme e stare svegli la notte.

translation.en: The night shift. It's, uh... life's rich pageant.
translation.it: Turno di notte. Rende... la vita più eccitante.

translation.en: You left this on the counter.
Have a great day, Amber. Always.
Hey, Jordan, is that a coloring book?
Because there are Marquez all over the pages.
We've had 31 days of school, that's 31 rides.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto 31 giorni di scuola, sono 31 viaggi.

translation.en: Thirty-one sandwiches, too, am I right?
-So many sandwiches. -Okay, seriously, Ty deserves a sandwich
because he has to leave the house way earlier than the rest of us.
translation.it: Ty merita il panino perché deve uscire prima di noi.

translation.en: -And I'm the only one who owns a car. -That's true.
translation.it: - E sono il solo con un'auto. - Vero.

translation.en: -A car? Okay. Well, this... Not a car. -Technically, I don't think you own it.
translation.it: - Beh, questa non è un'auto. - Tecnicamente, non credo sia tua.

translation.en: He's the only one with access to a car.
-Yes, thank you. Access. -[Jordan] Call it a vehicle.
I still fail to see how any of this warrants a sandwich.
translation.it: Continuo a non capire come questo meriti un panino.

translation.en: I think Amber's got a crush on Ty. That's why she makes him a sandwich.
translation.it: Penso che Amber abbia una cotta per Ty. Per questo fa i panini.

translation.en: Do you guys realize the marching band's been playing all year without a tuba?
translation.it: Sapevate che la banda ha suonato tutto l'anno senza tuba?

translation.en: Somebody stole it over the summer.
Yeah, look at Ryan Gold. She looks weird.
translation.it: Già, guardate Ryan Gold. Sembra stramba.

translation.en: They’ve played half the football season without it.
Now that state championships are coming up, if they don’t have a tuba,
translation.it: Ora che inizia il campionato, senza tuba verranno squalificati.

translation.en: -they’re automatically disqualified. -Okay, but who steals a tuba?
translation.it: Ora che inizia il campionato, senza tuba verranno squalificati. Ok, ma chi ruba una tuba?

translation.en: Someone who’s really horny for it.
You could get a lot of cash for one on the dark web.
translation.it: Puoi farci molti soldi sul Dark Web.

translation.en: Why don't they get another one? Borrow it or rent it, I don't know.
translation.it: Perché non ne prendono un altro? In prestito, a noleggio.

translation.en: Sure, Ty. Why don’t you just lend Ryan your extra tuba?
translation.it: Certo, Ty. Presta a Ryan la tua tuba extra.
- Sousafono. - Nessuno si è fatto avanti.

translation.en: About three, four grand should do it for a proper marching model.
translation.it: Tre o quattro testoni dovrebbero bastare.

translation.en: Is she on the dark web right now?
I say we make the tuba this year’s cause for the Variety Show.
translation.it: La tuba sarà la causa del variety show di quest'anno.

translation.en: Amber runs the Variety Show. She started it.
translation.it: Gestisce Amber lo spettacolo. L'ha ideato lei.

translation.en: But how do we get people excited over a tuba?
translation.it: Cosa importa una tuba alla gente?

translation.en: I don't know, but we have to. Just look at Ryan.
translation.it: Non lo so, ma dobbiamo farlo. Guardate Ryan.

translation.en: Leah is awesome. You know, she's auditioning for Oklahoma! this year?
translation.it: Leah è fantastica. Quest'anno fa il provino per Oklahoma!

translation.en: -You know where this is going, Ty. -Yeah, I do.
translation.it: - Sai dove vado a parare. - Sì.

translation.en: Come on! Mr. Franks thinks you'd make a great Curly. We all do.
translation.it: Il signor Franks pensa che saresti un Curly grandioso.

translation.en: -We need you this year. -I don't know.
Getting on stage in front of all those people, it's terrifying.
translation.it: Salire sul palco davanti a tutti è terrificante.

translation.en: You play soccer in front of all those people.
translation.it: Giochi a calcio davanti a tutti.

translation.en: Yeah, but I don't have to bust out with a show tune. [scoffs]
translation.it: Sì, ma non devo mettermi a cantare.

translation.en: Or wear a cowboy hat. I think you'd look great in a cowboy hat.
translation.it: - Con un cappello da cowboy. - Ti starebbe benissimo.

translation.en: I've been trying to text you, but I keep on getting delivery failure.
translation.it: Ti ho mandato un messaggio, ma mi dà errore.

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, that's a whole thing.
I lost my phone, and I haven't had a chance to get a new one yet.
translation.it: Ho perso il telefono e non ne ho ancora preso uno nuovo.

translation.en: I was hoping we could have, like...
Cell phones aren't private. It's much better to stay off-grid.
translation.it: I cellulari non sono privati. Meglio sconnessi.

translation.en: Plus, I'm the only teenager in all of America who doesn't have a cell phone.
translation.it: Inoltre, sono l'unica adolescente in America senza cellulare.

translation.en: How cool is that? Not cool at all?
[Ty] So, it--it takes place in, um, I'm assuming Oklahoma.
translation.it: Dunque, si svolge, presumo in Oklahoma.

translation.en: That's why we're trying to bring you in.
-All right, you got it. -That whole dynamic going on...
translation.it: - Va bene, hai capito. - Tutta la dinamica...

translation.en: That's very nice of you. Thank you very much.
Yeah, what's, uh, going on over there?
You know, it's just sort of some outdoor tableaus.
You know, some people listening to music, and sitting on a park bench.
translation.it: Sai, c'è gente che ascolta musica e sta seduta su una panchina al parco.

translation.en: -Trees, and tennis, and... -[Jordan] It's stylish. I like it.
translation.it: - Alberi e tennis, e... - È elegante. Mi piace.

translation.en: [Ty] I like it. Do one of 'em have a-- One has a mullet.
translation.it: Mi piace. Uno di loro ha un mullet.

translation.en: -It's very '80s. I like that. -[Chad] Yeah, it's very you. We approve.
translation.it: - Anni '80. Bella. - Sì, fa per lei. Approviamo.
- Franks. - Non direi anni '80, ma... Signor Franks?
CONGRATULAZIONI! LA INVITIAMO ALL'AUDIZIONE DI RECITAZIONE E MUSICAL

translation.en: -Does that mean that I-- -Yeah. You're being asked to audition at Carnegie Mellon.

translation.it: - Amber va a Pittsburgh. Guardate! - Cosa?

translation.en: [Chad] What song are you going to sing?
[Ricky] Pittsburgh? How are you going to get to Pittsburgh?
translation.it: Pittsburgh? Come ci arrivi a Pittsburgh?

translation.en: I was so tired, I just fell asleep.
translation.it: Ero stanca e mi sono addormentata.

translation.en: He's asked us to move in.
And I think we should do it.
And it is getting cold outside.
I'd rather freeze my ass off on a bus than go back to Oliver's.
translation.it: Preferirei gelare su un autobus che tornare da Oliver.
Perché? Vuole aiutarci e non abbiamo abbastanza soldi per una casa.

translation.en: and we still don't have enough money for an apartment.
translation.it: Vuole aiutarci e non abbiamo abbastanza soldi per una casa.

translation.en: What if we tried the shelter again?
No, I'm not going to the shelter. No.
translation.it: No, non ci vengo al rifugio.

translation.en: So that I can have people questioning my parenting?
translation.it: No. Per farmi mettere in discussione come madre?

translation.en: No one can find out about us. You understand?
translation.it: Nessuno deve sapere di noi. Hai capito?

translation.en: Because if they do, I'll lose you.
Let's just talk about this when you're in a better mood.
I got invited to audition for Carnegie Mellon.
translation.it: Ho un'audizione per la Carnegie Mellon.

translation.en: Your dad would be so proud.
How does it work? You sing for them?
Yeah. And then they crush my dreams.
translation.it: Già. E poi demoliscono i miei sogni.

translation.en: They won't. You're gonna be great.
How am I even gonna get to Pittsburgh?
Yeah, for an apartment, not some stupid audition.
translation.it: Per una casa, non per un'audizione.

translation.en: You're not yappin' all over the game like you usually do.
translation.it: Non stai starnazzando come tuo solito.
Ty è un amico. Siamo amici.

translation.en: Have you hooked up with him yet? Joan!
translation.it: - L'hai già fatto con qualcuno? - Joan!

translation.en: Get over it, and quit wasting your time thinking.
translation.it: Supera la cosa e non perdere tempo a pensare.

translation.en: Youth is precious, so you should enjoy it.
translation.it: La gioventù è preziosa, dovresti godertela.

translation.en: That's the most positive thing I think I've ever heard you say.
translation.it: Non hai mai detto cosa più positiva.

translation.en: Well, it's just another way of saying that life is nasty, brutish, and short.
translation.it: Beh, è solo un altro modo per dire che la vita è orribile, insulsa e breve.
Ok, Ricky. Giochi di parole con le uova. Vai.

translation.en: Well, I only know a few, so this will be over easy.
translation.it: Beh, devo consultare il mio albume dei doppisensi.

translation.en: Omelet you use that one if you want.
translation.it: Non farmi un occhio di bue.
Sì, non mangio il tuorlo, perché...

translation.en: I usually only eat eggs around hollandaise.
Can I talk to you for a minute?
I noticed you've been using my makeup.
translation.it: Ho notato che hai usato i miei trucchi.

translation.en: It's okay. I used to dip into my sister's makeup all the time,
translation.it: - Donna, scusami. - Non importa. Usavo i trucchi di mia sorella, ma fa un po' schifo. Perciò...

translation.en: but it's kind of gross. So...
translation.it: Usavo i trucchi di mia sorella, ma fa un po' schifo. Perciò...

translation.en: What do you mean? Sure you can.
No, I just-- I don't wear makeup.
translation.it: No, è che... Non mi trucco.

translation.en: I was practicing. I'm really sorry.
I know, and it's really great. I just--
translation.it: Lo so, ed è grandioso. È proprio che...
Sì, alla grande. Mai stata meglio.

translation.en: The tuba's a great cause, and I know you'd shine up there.
translation.it: La tuba è un'ottima causa, farai faville lassù.

translation.en: I don't have any real skills, Amber.
Sure, you do. When you close your eyes, what do you imagine yourself doing?
translation.it: Certo che sì. Se chiudi gli occhi, cosa immagini di fare?

translation.en: Tommy, you're going to kill it.
But what if I eat it?
-Awesome, can't wait to hear it. -Thank you.
Okay. So, Ricky's gonna do a pun-off.
translation.it: Ricky si esibirà in giochi di parole.

translation.en: -Put me down as Lingo Starr. -I love it.
Chad, you're going to wow us with some thespianism, right?
translation.it: Chad, tu ci ammalierai con la tua arte scenica.
- Il piano è quello. - Fantastico. Ty?

translation.en: Uh, I thought I'd stage manage. Help out with the behind-the-scenes stuff.
translation.it: Pensavo di gestire il palco. Aiutare dietro le quinte.

translation.en: Come on! You've gotta do something up there. You're so talented.
translation.it: Avanti! Devi fare qualcosa. Hai molto talento.

translation.en: He’s only good at soccer as far as we know.
translation.it: Sappiamo che è bravo a calcio.

translation.en: Exactly! And this is your chance to show everyone
translation.it: Esatto! È la tua occasione per dimostrare

translation.en: how very talented you are, and also charismatic.
translation.it: quanto sei talentuoso e anche carismatico.

translation.en: -Okay, yeah, I'll think about it. -Yes! All right.
translation.it: - Ok, sì, ci penserò. - Sì! D'accordo.

translation.en: I'll be performing an Argentine tango.
I can finally tell you my sister watches a little too much Dancing with the Stars.
translation.it: Diciamo che mia sorella guarda troppo Ballando con le stelle.

translation.en: A, That is a lie. B, please put me down for an Argentine tango.
translation.it: A, è falso. B, ti prego, metti tango argentino.

translation.en: You do realize it takes two human beings to tango, right?
translation.it: Lo sai che servono due esseri umani per il tango?

translation.en: Put me down as “Jordan and TBD.”
Me? No. This is for you guys. I'm not gonna get involved.
translation.it: Io? No. È una cosa vostra. Non coinvolgetemi.

translation.en: -What? Are you kidding? -Come on, man. Really?
-You have to help us out. -[Ricky] Do it.

translation.it: - Qualunque cosa! - Sicuri? Sì, siamo sicuri.

translation.en: All right. I'll think of something.
Right? Is that what it is? I don't know. I have work to do, guys.
translation.it: Giusto? È così? Non lo so. Devo lavorare, ragazzi.

translation.en: Okay, you know the school can help foot the bill for this.
translation.it: Ok, sai che può pagare la scuola.

translation.en: There's this discretionary fund for students in need.
translation.it: C'è un fondo per gli studenti bisognosi.

translation.en: Okay, but I'm not in need. I am flush.
translation.it: Ok, ma non sono bisognosa. Ho il grano.

translation.en: One ticket to Pittsburgh, coming right up.
translation.it: Un biglietto per Pittsburgh in arrivo.

translation.en: Carnegie Mellon will not know what hit them.
translation.it: La Carnegie Mellon resterà di stucco.

translation.en: I got fired. I had two drinks. I'm not drunk.
translation.it: Mi hanno licenziata. Ho bevuto due drink. Non sono ubriaca.

translation.en: It doesn't matter. They found out.
Oliver's coming to pick us up.
I had my money in there.
I don't know what to do, Ty.
My mom's gonna be looking for me,
and I can't go back to Oliver's.
translation.it: e non posso tornare da Oliver.

translation.en: We don't have school on Monday.
[Ty] It’s a really important audition, Mom.
I thought the peace and quiet would do Amber a lot of good.
translation.it: Penso che un po' di pace possa aiutare Amber.

translation.en: Plus, we've got such a good piano up here, I don't see why we wouldn't use it.
translation.it: E qui abbiamo un ottimo piano, non vedo perché non usarlo.

translation.en: No, I get that. I'm sorry. You're right. I should have told you.
translation.it: No, mi dispiace. Hai ragione. Dovevo dirtelo.

translation.en: Nobody's going to be partying up here, we're gonna be practicing.
Runs in the family, I guess.
All right, ready when you are.
♪ I didn’t know it But my life had changed ♪
translation.it: E con te nulla è più impossibile
Sembrava un sogno, ma non è

translation.en: ♪ And all I saw was you ♪
translation.it: Sei ciò che voglio di più
Non riesco a controllare in me

translation.en: ♪ Oh, what I saw in you ♪
♪ To a place that we can call our own ♪
translation.it: Dove posso amarti, d’ora in poi

translation.en: ♪ I wanna know what feels like home ♪
translation.it: E un posto nostro, se lo vuoi

translation.en: ♪ To a place that we can call our own ♪
translation.it: Dove posso amarti, d’ora in poi

translation.en: ♪ I wanna know what feels like home ♪
translation.it: E un posto nostro, se lo vuoi

translation.en: ♪ To a place that we can call our own ♪
translation.it: Dove posso amarti, d’ora in poi

translation.en: ♪ I wanna know what feels like home ♪
translation.it: E un posto nostro, se lo vuoi

translation.en: I'm sorry, but you have zero talent.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, ma non hai affatto talento.

translation.en: That was embarrassing. I was embarrassed for you.
translation.it: È stato imbarazzante. Ero in imbarazzo per te.

translation.en: He wrote that song for my mom.
Never even knew anything was wrong with it.
translation.it: Non sapevo che qualcosa non andasse.

translation.en: My mom tried to keep it together.
translation.it: Mia mamma cercò di tenere duro.

translation.en: She just didn't have any family around.
translation.it: Non aveva una famiglia che la aiutasse.

translation.en: So little by little, things started to go downhill.
translation.it: Così, a poco a poco, le cose iniziarono a peggiorare.

translation.en: When we got evicted, we moved in with Oliver.
translation.it: Quando ci sfrattarono ci trasferimmo da Oliver.

translation.en: First night we got there, they went out drinking.
translation.it: La prima sera lì, uscirono a bere.

translation.en: She'd been sober for five months.
Then one night, he hit her.
We're going to figure something out, all right?
Ricky's over at Chad and Jordan's practicing for the Variety Show.
translation.it: Ricky è da Chad e Jordan per provare lo spettacolo.

translation.en: Yeah, I actually came to see you.
translation.it: A dire il vero sono venuta per te.

translation.en: I need to tell you something.
I don't understand what's going on here.
We just want to discuss some things with you, Becky.
translation.it: Vogliamo solo parlare di alcune cose con te, Becky.

translation.en: Well, I, uh, came here to pick up my daughter,
translation.it: Beh, sono qui per prendere mia figlia,

translation.en: because she was missing all weekend and I was worried sick,
translation.it: che è sparita nel weekend ed ero spaventata,

translation.en: and I don't really want to discuss anything with you.
translation.it: e non voglio parlare di niente con te.

translation.en: What are you looking at her for?
Amber wants you to know she doesn't feel comfortable living at Oliver's.
translation.it: Amber non si sente a suo agio a vivere da Oliver.

translation.en: So you two talked about everything, huh?
translation.it: Così avete parlato di tutto, eh?

translation.en: Well, it may not be comfortable, but that is where we live now.
translation.it: Beh, magari non sarà a suo agio, ma ora viviamo lì.

translation.en: I don't wanna live there again.
You felt safer living on a bus?
I just think-- I don't care what you think.
translation.it: - Io penso... - Non m'importa cosa pensi.

translation.en: Donna says I can stay here for a few nights, until we figure this out.
translation.it: Donna mi fa stare qualche notte, finché non risolviamo.

translation.en: Who-- Who do you think you are? Really?
translation.it: Chi ti credi di essere? Sul serio?

translation.en: She is my daughter. She stays with me.
translation.it: È mia figlia. Lei resta con me.

translation.en: I'm not going anywhere with you until you move out of Oliver's.
translation.it: Non verrò se non vai via da Oliver.

translation.en: If you keep her here, I'm calling the cops.
Well, maybe that's not a bad idea.
translation.it: Forse non è una cattiva idea.

translation.en: Maybe we all need to have a conversation about this.
I'm the one that keeps things together.
translation.it: Sono io che tengo tutto insieme.

translation.en: Really, Mom? You do that? I had no idea.
translation.it: Sul serio, mamma? Non ne avevo idea.

translation.en: Can't you-- You can't see that I'm trying to take care of you?
translation.it: Non vedi che sto cercando di prendermi cura di te?

translation.en: I'm doing my best. Well, your best isn't good enough.
translation.it: - Faccio il possibile. - Beh, non è abbastanza.

translation.en: Stay here for the rest of your life for all I care.
translation.it: Resta per tutta la vita, sai cosa m'importa.

translation.en: What am I supposed to do?
And we can get you help. We can start over.
Life is so much more complicated than you think, baby.
translation.it: La vita è molto più complicata di quanto pensi, piccola.
Hai tutto ciò che ti serve?

translation.en: I'm really sorry for putting you in the middle of all this.
translation.it: Mi spiace averti messa in mezzo.

translation.en: You have nothing... nothing to be sorry about.
translation.it: Non hai niente, niente di cui scusarti.

translation.en: Just... try to get some rest, okay?
translation.it: Cerca... Prova a riposare un po', ok?

translation.en: [teacher] The Executive Branch had three departments.
translation.it: Il potere esecutivo aveva tre dipartimenti.

translation.en: There was the Department of State, which was led by Thomas Jefferson.
translation.it: C'era il Dipartimento di Stato, guidato da Thomas Jefferson.

translation.en: There was the Department of Treasury, -which was led by-- -[door opens]
translation.it: C'era il Dipartimento del Tesoro, guidato da...

translation.en: [softly] Hey. I need to speak with Amber.
Amber, this is Officer Rozick and Officer Garland.
translation.it: Amber, loro sono gli agenti Rozick e Garland.

translation.en: I know what this is about.
was involved in an automobile accident early this morning.
translation.it: è stata coinvolta in un incidente d'auto stamattina presto.

translation.en: We're sorry to have to tell you, but she died of her injuries on the way to the hospital.
translation.it: Ci spiace doverti dire che è morta durante il trasporto in ospedale.

translation.en: [Rozick] Amber, do you have any friends or relatives you can stay with tonight?
translation.it: Amber, hai amici o parenti con cui stare stasera?

translation.en: [Rozick] Okay. We'll need to contact them.
We also need you to come with us to answer a few questions.
translation.it: Dovresti venire per rispondere a delle domande.

translation.en: The driver... also died in the collision.
translation.it: Anche l'autista... è morto nella collisione.
È stata coinvolta solo la loro auto.

translation.en: [Garland] The cause of the accident is still being investigated.
translation.it: Stiamo ancora indagando sulle cause dell'incidente.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I need to use the bathroom.
[Ty] That's why I think it makes more sense if Leah comes after.
translation.it: Per questo ha più senso se Leah viene dopo.

translation.en: Should I go before or after Leah's juggling act?
translation.it: Vado prima o dopo la giocoleria di Leah?

translation.en: Uh, it's... Whatever you guys want.

translation.it: - Dopo va bene. - Sì. Dovrebbe andare.

translation.en: When a verb ends in a silent "e," drop the "e"
translation.it: Quando un verbo finisce con una "e" muta, al passato

translation.en: and add "ed" to form the past tense.
Aren't we going to sing, Amber?
I bet you're sick of people asking you if you're okay.
translation.it: Sarai stufa di sentirti chiedere se stai bene.

translation.en: I went to your fancy vacation house.
translation.it: Sono venuta nella tua bella casa.

translation.en: I had fun while she needed me.
translation.it: Mi sono divertita mentre lei aveva bisogno di me.

translation.en: Then I came back, and I pushed her away.
translation.it: Poi sono tornata e l'ho respinta.

translation.en: Listen, I can only imagine how hard it is for you right now.
translation.it: Ascolta... posso solo immaginare quanto sia difficile per te.

translation.en: the reason you earned this opportunity,
that's still there. That doesn't go away.
translation.it: è ancora lì. Non va via.

translation.en: So, the pain that you're feeling,
I think you just-- just channel it.
Channel it, put it into your song.
Because that's what an artist does.
translation.it: Perché è così che fa un artista.

translation.en: You have to finish your food, you can't just stare at it.
translation.it: Devi finire il pranzo, non basta fissarlo.

translation.en: I figured we'd leave for the airport at 7:00 a.m. the latest, maybe even 6:30.
translation.it: Direi di partire per l'aeroporto almeno alle 7, anche le 6:30.

translation.en: And, um, you're all set up for the dorm
translation.it: È tutto pronto per il dormitorio...

translation.en: and the student is gonna show you around.
translation.it: e uno studente ti mostrerà il posto.

translation.en: You have enough money for the cab?
translation.it: Hai i soldi per il taxi?

translation.en: Bobby has a mass on his spleen.
translation.it: Bobby ha una massa sulla milza.

translation.en: That's what's been causing his discomfort.
translation.it: È questo che gli causa malessere.

translation.en: But either way, the treatment is exactly the same...
translation.it: Ma in ogni caso, il trattamento è lo stesso,

translation.en: We'll need to do surgery to remove the mass.
If that's successful, he could make a full recovery.
translation.it: Se ha successo, potrebbe riprendersi completamente.

translation.en: [Amber] So that's twelve dollars an hour.
Uh, and the most I could work is a ten-hour shift?
translation.it: E al massimo posso fare un turno di dieci ore.
Gli straordinari sono una volta e mezzo.

translation.en: Okay, thank you, Lloyd. I appreciate it.
Well, um, I explained everything to the Admissions Office,
translation.it: Beh, ho spiegato tutto all'ufficio delle ammissioni,

translation.en: I think they can get you another audition slot.
translation.it: Credo ti lasceranno dare un'altra audizione.

translation.en: Amber, if it's about the plane ticket,
translation.it: Se è per il biglietto aereo,

translation.en: -you don't have to-- -I can't audition, Donna.
[Ricky] Lloyd has hired Amber full-time at the donut shop.
translation.it: Lloyd l'ha assunta full-time al negozio di donut.

translation.en: Also, she added to her hours at the retirement home.
translation.it: Inoltre, ha aggiunto ore alla casa di riposo.

translation.en: If she works 70 hours a week at minimum wage,
translation.it: Se lavora 70 ore a settimana al salario minimo,

translation.en: she could pay for Bobby's surgery in ten-and-a-half weeks.
translation.it: potrebbe pagare l'intervento tra 10 settimane e mezzo.

translation.en: You can't work 70 hours a week and go to school.
translation.it: Non puoi lavorare 70 ore e andare a scuola.

translation.en: No, you can't do that, you can't throw everything away.
translation.it: No, non puoi buttare via tutto.

translation.en: Donna, I really appreciate everything you've done--
It's not about that. It's about you and your future.
translation.it: Non si tratta di quello. Ma di te e del tuo futuro.

translation.en: You have so much to look forward to, and so much talent. I can't let you--
translation.it: Hai tanto a cui aspirare e tanto talento. Non posso lasciarti...

translation.en: You can't just drop out of school.
Ty, look, I am so tired. I just can't right now.
translation.it: Ty, sono molto stanca. Non riesco, adesso.

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry about Bobby.
He's awesome. And I know that he's really important to you, but--
translation.it: È fantastico. - È molto importante per te, ma... - No.
- È molto importante per te, ma... - No.

translation.en: Don't say he's just a dog.
translation.it: Non dire che è solo un cane.

translation.en: Because he's not. Not to me.
translation.it: Perché non lo è. Non per me.

translation.en: Let me help you. I can ask my parents.
translation.it: Lascia che ti aiuti. Chiedo ai miei.

translation.en: -I'm handling it. -Listen to me, it can be a loan.
Okay? You can pay them back slowly while you finish school--
translation.it: Ok? Li ripagherai quando finirai la scuola...

translation.en: Ty, stop! I have this under control.
Damn it, Amber, you are so stubborn!
You do so much for other people,
but when you need just a little bit of help, you push us all away.
translation.it: ma se ti serve un po' di aiuto, ci tieni lontani.

translation.en: What is so bad about needing help?
translation.it: Cosa c'è di male ad aver bisogno?

translation.en: Like, if you don't do this on your own, you're weak?
translation.it: Se non riesci da sola, sei debole?

translation.en: I bet part of you is glad that you missed the audition.
translation.it: Parte di te è felice di aver perso l'audizione.

translation.en: and you got an excuse to punish yourself for letting your mom down,
translation.it: e così puoi punirti per aver deluso tua madre,

translation.en: You're suffering, and you won't admit it.
translation.it: Stai soffrendo e non vuoi ammetterlo.

translation.en: You expect the rest of us to sit by and watch you go down the drain,
translation.it: Dovremmo stare a guardare mentre mandi in fumo tutto,

translation.en: I'm sorry, that must really suck, life not being fair.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, dev'essere uno schifo, una vita non giusta.

translation.en: You know what you should do to make yourself feel better?
translation.it: Sai cosa ti farebbe stare meglio?

translation.en: I don't know, you should hang out with your two parents at your vacation home.
translation.it: Andare con i tuoi due genitori, nella vostra casa vacanze.

translation.en: Maybe that'll help you get over life and its vast unfairness.
translation.it: Forse ti aiuterà a superare le grandi ingiustizie della vita.

translation.en: Take the rack, both sides in,
translation.it: Prendi il cestello da entrambi i lati,

translation.en: You know, it's a lot easier watching it this way.
translation.it: Sai, è molto più facile guardarla così.

translation.en: Well, my ears don't hurt from all your loud singing, and talking, and terrible jokes.
translation.it: Non mi fanno male le orecchie perché canti, parli o fai battute terribili.

translation.en: In fact, if you happen to see the old Amber,
translation.it: Anzi, se incontrassi la vecchia Amber,

translation.en: well, you can tell her that...
it was a living hell just being around her.
translation.it: era un vero inferno starle accanto.

translation.en: All that disgusting cheer and helpfulness.
translation.it: Tutta quella disgustosa allegria e disponibilità.

translation.en: You've been putting this show on for the last three years.
translation.it: Organizzi questo spettacolo da tre anni.

translation.en: It's the last one you'll ever get to see.
I have to finish my shift.
Usually, but we're out of donuts.
translation.it: Di solito. Ma... abbiamo finito i donut.
Vai. Stai con i tuoi amici.

translation.en: Why are all those people here?
Must be really into supporting brass instruments, I guess.
translation.it: Devono essere tutti fanatici degli strumenti d'ottone, immagino.

translation.en: Ty, that's way too many people for the Variety Show.
translation.it: Ty, è troppa gente per lo spettacolo.

translation.en: You think it's a lot of people?
a normal amount of people. Um...
We ended up changing the proceeds to going to Bobby Big Boy's surgery.
translation.it: Il ricavato va all'operazione di Bobby Brutta Belva.
- Cosa? - Lo so, già, lo so.

translation.en: Look, before you-- before-- before this gets out of hand,
translation.it: Senti, prima che tu... prima che ci sfugga di mano,

translation.en: I want to say something. I want to say that I'm sorry.
translation.it: voglio dire una cosa. Che mi dispiace.

translation.en: I want to say that I'm sorry about the other-- Well, you know, I was...
translation.it: Voglio dire che mi dispiace per l'altro... Beh, lo sai, sono...

translation.en: I was way too hard on you.
I was frustrated because I care about you...
translation.it: Ero frustrato, perché... tengo a te...

translation.en: All of these people care about you.
translation.it: Tutta questa gente tiene a te.

translation.en: They showed up for you. Okay?
translation.it: Sono venuti qui per te. Ok?

translation.en: So for once, you're gonna have to deal with that, all right?
translation.it: Quindi, per una volta, dovrai affrontare la cosa, ok?

translation.en: What if I don't know how?
Think of it as a gift.
Okay? Think of it as a gift that you're giving us
translation.it: Ok? Consideralo un regalo che ci stai facendo,

translation.en: Have a seat, the show's about to start.
Where are you going to sit?
and welcome to the "Save Bobby Big Boy" Variety Show!
translation.it: Benvenuti al Variety Show Salviamo Bobby Brutta Belva!

translation.en: Now, we have some amazing acts lined up for you tonight.
translation.it: Ora, questa sera abbiamo dei numeri fantastici per voi.

translation.en: But before we get to those, I wanted to make a few opening remarks.
translation.it: Ma prima di cominciare, volevo fare qualche commento di apertura.

translation.en: Amber Appleton puts together this Variety Show every year
translation.it: Amber Appleton organizza lo spettacolo ogni anno

translation.en: to raise money for various school causes.
translation.it: raccogliendo fondi per varie cause scolastiche.

translation.en: She's also helped the Drama Club mount their productions,
translation.it: Ha aiutato il gruppo teatrale ad allestire le produzioni,

translation.en: has lobbied the school board for better wheelchair access,
translation.it: ha battagliato per l'accesso ai disabili,

translation.en: and has made me countless delicious fried-egg sandwiches.
translation.it: e mi ha preparato un'infinità di panini all'uovo deliziosi.

translation.en: Just by being here tonight, she has helped me get over my...
translation.it: Solo con la sua presenza qui mi ha aiutato a superare...
la mia gigantesca paura del palcoscenico.

translation.en: Honestly, I don't know, maybe. I still might throw up, we'll see.
even though it's really tough for her to admit,
translation.it: anche se per lei è difficile ammetterlo,

translation.en: Our goal tonight is to raise $8,000,
so that her dog, Bobby Big Boy, can get a life-saving operation.
translation.it: per un intervento vitale del suo cane, Bobby Brutta Belva.

translation.en: We have raised over $2,000 in ticket sales alone so far.
translation.it: Abbiamo raccolto più di 2.000 dollari solo con i biglietti.

translation.en: So, please, get out your phones
translation.it: Quindi, per favore, tirate fuori i telefoni

translation.en: and tweet, Instagram, Facebook, live stream,
anything you can to help get the word out.
translation.it: qualunque cosa possiate per spargere la voce.

translation.en: So, let's get to our first act.
Do you bite your thumb at me, sir. I do bite my thumb, sir.
translation.it: - Mordete il pollice per me, signore? - Mordo il pollice, signore.

translation.en: Do you bite your thumb at me, sir?
translation.it: Mordete il pollice per me, signore?

translation.en: No, sir. I do not bite my thumb at you, sir, but I do bite my thumb, sir.
translation.it: No, signore. Non mordo il pollice per voi. Ma mordo il pollice, signore.

translation.en: All right, let's refresh our page and see where we are.
translation.it: Bene, aggiorniamo la pagina e vediamo dove siamo.

translation.en: -Please, keep spreading the word. -[cheers and applause]
Next up, we have the punniest man alive.
translation.it: Ora tocca al giocoliere della parola.

translation.en: Give it up for Ricky Lingo Starr Roberts!
translation.it: Un applauso per Ricky Arringo Starr Roberts!

translation.en: I'm here to talk to you about man's best friend.
translation.it: Sono qui per parlarvi del miglior amico dell'uomo.
Beh... il migliore amico di un uomo, il mio.
il migliore amico di un uomo, il mio.

translation.en: She's a human woman. Not a dog...
translation.it: È una donna umana. Non un cane...

translation.en: but she's got a great one in Bobby Big Boy.
translation.it: ma ne ha uno fantastico ed è Bobby Brutta Belva.

translation.en: they got a little ruff for these two,
translation.it: si sono accanite su di loro,

translation.en: but we're here to give triple-B a new leash on life.
translation.it: ma siamo qui per offrire a tre-B un colpo di coda.

translation.en: I can say Lapso-lutely amazing things about Amber,
translation.it: Posso dire solo cose carline di Amber,

translation.en: but you all might Terrier your hair out.
And I don't want Amber to sit there
translation.it: E non voglio che Amber se ne stia lì

translation.en: and Rottweiler friends Schnauzer off in front of everyone.
translation.it: a domandarsi se-gugio o se staccarmi lo spinone.

translation.en: So embarrassed of all the Shih Tzu here,
that she Pekingese eyes out from behind her hands.
I'll keep things Pug-ressing for a Spaniel be able to handle,
translation.it: Tra un po' mi levrierò dalle scatole, prima che sguinzagliate i lupi,

translation.en: you Mastiff known I would take this speech,
and Basset on the fact that you're a Great Dane...
translation.it: sono una persona terrier-terrier, ma-stino molto quello che sei...

translation.en: and my best friend in the whole world.
translation.it: La mia migliore amica al mondo.

translation.en: All right, let's take another look at where we are.
translation.it: Ok, diamo un'altra occhiata a dove siamo.

translation.en: Let's keep those pledges coming in.
And now, for our last act of the night,
translation.it: E ora, il nostro ultimo atto della serata,

translation.en: ladies and gentlemen, the Korean Divas,
translation.it: signore e signori, le Korean Divas,

translation.en: accompanied by our very own McKinley High marching band,
translation.it: accompagnate dalla nostra banda del liceo McKinley,
e la loro tuba nuova di zecca.

translation.en: I don't know. Ricky said something about the "dark web."
translation.it: Non so. Ricky ha parlato di "dark web".

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, The Korean Divas and the McKinley High Marching Band!
translation.it: Signore e signori, le Korean Divas e la banda del liceo McKinley!

translation.en: Six thousand, three hundred and four dollars.
I'd like to thank all the acts, everybody who contributed.
translation.it: Ringrazio tutti gli artisti, chi ha contribuito,

translation.en: It's been an awesome night. Thank you so, so much.
translation.it: è stata una serata magnifica. Grazie mille.

translation.en: Now, we didn't quite make our goal, but we'll keep the page open. So please keep spreading the word.
translation.it: L'obiettivo non è raggiunto, ma la pagina è aperta. Continuate a spargere la voce.

translation.en: Everybody, our guest of honor, Amber Appleton!
translation.it: Gente, la nostra ospite d'onore, Amber Appleton!

translation.en: a hundred percent sure this is happening yet.
translation.it: del tutto sicura che stia succedendo.

translation.en: But I'm so happy that the marching band got their tuba.
translation.it: Ma sono felice che la banda abbia la sua tuba.

translation.en: Hope is the thing with feathers.
We'd read it at bedtime for...
as long as I can remember.
even in the darkest of times.
But you all helped me find it again.
I don't know how to repay you.
But I guess that's the point.
translation.it: O forse il senso è quello.

translation.en: I don't have to repay you.
I just have to take the gift that you've given me
translation.it: Devo solo accettare il regalo che mi avete dato

translation.en: Should we take one last look at our total?
Um, can we get a refresh on that, please?
No. I promise you, I had nothing...
translation.it: No. Ti giuro che non ho niente...

translation.en: Looks like we got an anonymous donation of $200,000,

translation.it: ha portato il totale a 206.844 dollari.

translation.en: [Amber] Hi, Mr. Linder. It's me, Amber Appleton.
translation.it: Salve, signor Linder. Sono io, Amber Appleton.

translation.en: No, I work here on the weekends,
but I had some extra donuts, so I thought I'd stop by.
translation.it: ma avevo dei donut, e ho pensato di portarli.

translation.en: Oh, for God's sake, it's not a bomb. Open it.
translation.it: Oh, santo cielo, non è una bomba. Aprilo.

translation.en: [Joan] Told you I'd make you cry.
translation.it: Avevo detto che ti avrei fatta piangere.

translation.en: What am I supposed to do with all that dough, huh?
translation.it: Cosa faccio con tutti quei soldi?

translation.en: I don't have any family left.

translation.it: Beh, non è del tutto vero.
In realtà, tu sei la mia famiglia.

translation.en: And you can make better use of it than anyone else I know.
translation.it: E ne farai un uso migliore di chiunque altro io conosca.

translation.en: Oh, God, no. No more waterworks. I only wanted to see it the one time.
translation.it: Oh, Dio, no. Basta giochi d'acqua. Volevo vederli una volta sola.
Beh, non posso farne a meno.

translation.en: -Bye, Bobby. -♪ Feeling is all I have ♪
-♪ Find the words I need to see ♪ -You got this.
